title: The Original Most Interesting Man In The World
dc:creator: WBUR
description: King David Kal훮kaua was the last king of Hawaii. But he was much more than that -- he was a traveler, a dreamer, a tech nerd. Or maybe he was fond of drinking, reveling and gambling. It depends on who you ask. But one thing he was not: Boring.
